bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. Combined Designation of all evil qi evoked by curses released by ghosts and demon spirits. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry jiu 酒：主行藥勢，殺百邪惡毒氣 , “It is capable of transporting the effects of pharmaceutical substances, and it kills the qi of one hundred evils and malign poison”.

② Combined Designation of all Pathological Condition resulting from curses released by ghosts and demon spirits. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry shi chang sheng 石長生：治疥癬，逐諸風，治百邪鬼魅 , “It cures jie -illness and xuan -illness, removes all types of wind, and cures the one hundred evils and demonic seduction-specters”.
